name: mid
description: Extracts a substring from a string.

params.name: String
params.description: The string from which the substring will be extracted.

params.name: start
params.description: The position of the first character to retrieve.

params.name: count
params.description: The number of characters to retrieve.

examples.title: Extract month from date
examples.description: Grabs the month out of a raw date yyyymmdd value.
